climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: 🌳 BAMBOO BABY WIPES: Thankfully, bamboo grows faster than babies do, which is why we chose to use it to make our eco-friendly baby wipes. Each wipe is soft on sensitive skin and super strong, making them perfect for everyday use. From changing tables to dining tables, Eco Wave Baby Wipes are an excellent choice for your family and Mother Earth.

🌳 99% PURIFIED WATER WIPES: Our unscented baby wipes are made with 99% purified water for a gentler clean and are ideal for using on even the most sensitive skin. Our water-based wipes are hypoallergenic alcohol, paraben, chemical + sulphate free, 6 x 64 wipes (384 Wipes).

🌳 100% COMPOSTABLE & BIODEGRADABLE: Eco Wave Baby Wipes are 100% compostable and biodegradable, made with the highest quality bamboo. These handy eco-friendly baby wipes help to reduce the amount of plastic waste we send to landfill, making them an excellent choice for eco-conscious parents.

🌳 ABSOLUTELY NO NASTIES: You can trust that Eco Wave Water Wipes are free from sulphates, parabens, fragrances, alcohol, and chemicals. Only the purest ingredients are infused into our bamboo based water wipes to gently clean baby’s skin. Eliminate unwanted mess without worrying about any hidden nasties.

🌳 LIVE THE ECO WAVE WAY: Ditch the plastic and live the Eco Wave way. Our planet-friendly, plastic-free baby water wipes help you live a more eco-conscious life whilst reducing the waste we send to landfill for a cleaner, happier planet for all. Even our packaging is fully recyclable and easy to use, great for your bundle of joy!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: For Anywehere, Anytime! For Those Diaper Moments Pick up a pack of Eco Wave Baby Water Wipes and start your journey to a brighter, better way of living. Our wipes are made with natural bamboo material – the most sustainable material there is - and infused with 99% purified water, perfect for super sensitive newborn skin. 99% Pure Water Wipes With a no-nasty promise, Eco Wave baby wipes are trusted by moms and dads all over the world. Our bamboo wipes use pure water and natural ingredients to clean skin and clear mess without a fuss. You’ll find no chemicals, parabens, sulphates, alcohol or fragrances in our sensitive baby wipes. Our packs of unscented, wipes are hypo-allergenic and a fantastic option for families with sensitive skin. Baby Wipes that Break Down In Nature We all know how many wipes parents go through when caring for a newborn baby. It sometimes feels like a never-ending pile of dirty diapers and messy wipes. By simply switching to a Eco Wave's cleaning wipe suitable for children and babies, you drastically reduce the amount of waste produced every single day.

Our Certificates Our wipes are certified EN13432 EN13432 CERTIFIED: Eco Wave baby wipes are EN13432 certified, meaning they meet strict European composting guidelines. (Certificate by TÜV AUSTRIA issued on January, 2016) One Tree Planted We plant trees! We've partnered with One Tree Planted and donate a portion of our profits to them every year to help them on their mission of planting more trees around the world.
Thank You For Choosing Eco Wave

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fair price, great quality and most importantly gentle on my sensitive new babies skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: ECO WAVE Baby Wipes are an excellent choice for parents who prioritize sustainability and care for their little ones' sensitive skin. These 100% compostable and eco-friendly bamboo water wipes are a step in the right direction for the planet. They are unscented, hypoallergenic, and vegan, making them gentle on your baby's skin and reducing the chances of irritation. Plus, being alcohol-free, they're even more suitable for those with sensitive skin. With 384 wipes per pack, these are both practical and environmentally conscious.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ECO WAVE Baby Wipes
reviews.reviewText: These ECO WAVE baby wipes come with a lot of wipes! You get 384 wipes all together. These wipes are absorbent, and they're also compostable. Each wipe is a good size, and they definitely clean up messes with ease.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are nice quality wipes. They aren’t thick, but not overly thin either. They are soft, but don’t have much texture or weight to them. No harsh scents in these unscented wipes. Easy open, pull, press sealed pouches. I would definitely purchase these regularly for everyday use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not The Softest Wipes But Not Bad
reviews.reviewText: I have used these on both my 6 month old and 3 year old. My toddler has never had sensitivity issues to wipes or diapers, but my infant has gotten rashes from some wipes. Luckily, this didn't seem to irritate either ones skin. I do think it has some type of scent to it and they are not super soft compared to other brands. But it gets the job done and doesn't irritate my kids so overall I think it's just fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and made for baby skin
reviews.reviewText: This Eco-Friendly Bamboo Water Wipes is full of moisture and comes in easy to use pack.The size of the wipes were little small but it does the job.The wipes don't leave any residue and is strong and is fragrance free.The wipes are great for sensitive skin and feels fresh and hydrated after use.Overall a nice quality product at a decent price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pleasantly surprised by these tissues
reviews.reviewText: I usually use the leading brand sensitive wipes and compare all new wipes to those. I was very positively surprised by these wipes. They are pretty much perfect. They are soft yet strong and have the perfect amount of moisture. They come out of the packet easily and are easy to pull out one by one. They don't have any weird smells and feel very clean and good for sensitive skin. I might continue getting these over the leading brand ones in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good wipes
reviews.reviewText: These wipes work pretty well. They are moist and have a durable integrity. They feel a tiny bit rougher than other brands I have used, but not enough to bother me that much. I would probably use these on older kids and not a direct newborn baby.
